thread.title: OhMiBod invites developers to make cybersexy apps for its sex toys
thread.title_full: OhMiBod invites developers to make cybersexy apps for its sex toys

author: Pollyanna
title: OhMiBod invites developers to make cybersexy apps for its sex toys
text:
By Taylor Hatmaker 
Sex toy maker OhMiBod just announced that the company is looking to open up its relationship… with developers. Best known for its digitally-connected vibrators, OhMiBod will release an open SDK to accompany its latest line of devices this spring. The company notes that some creative apps could tie the company’s line of sex toys into hookup apps like Tinder and Grindr, making for…   techcrunch.com – gadgets Rate this post
